attributes.action: Limit Car Drivers to 1000cc vehicles, until age 21
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As introduced for motorcycles

There is an increasing problem with young persons under 21, handling the power of Cars, before they have sufficient 'Road Knowledge', coupled with a desire to 'show off to their mates'

Motorcycles have been limited for under 21's to combat a theoritical similar problem - but not Cars

Lets have equality across all types of vehicle

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
